meta.description: Minimize the total number of canoes and diesel boats needed to transport at least 1000 fish to shore, with environmental constraints.

sets.name: TRANSPORT_MODES
sets.description: Types of transport modes available for sending fish to shore.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each transport mode in terms of number of fish.

vars.name: num_transport
vars.description: Number of each transport mode used.

objective.name: min_total_transport
objective.description: Minimize the total number of canoes and diesel boats used.

constraints.name: fish_transport_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 1000 fish are transported to shore.

constraints.name: environmental_rule
constraints.description: The number of canoes used must be at least 3 times the number of diesel boats used.
